name: Assam Mukhyamantri Krishi Sa Sajuli Yozana
description: The scheme is a State Owned Priority Development (SOPD) scheme for farmers launched by the Assam government. It provides financial assistance to eligible farmers in Assam.

name: Assam Farmer's Credit Subsidy Scheme (AFCSS)
description: The scheme provides 25% reimbursement (subsidy) on short term crop loans up to a maximum cap. It aims to benefit farmers in Assam by reducing their loan burden.

name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: This scheme promotes sustainable agricultural practices to enhance productivity and income. While not Assam-specific, the Assam government implements it.

name: Schemes | Department of Agriculture & Horticulture, Assam
description: This is a general link to the department's schemes, including Agri Vision 2025, Horti Vision 2020, National Food Security Mission, National Mission on Oil Seeds & Oil Palm, and Credit Guarantee Fund Scheme. Needs further exploration on the website.

name: Agriculture Loan - AGVB
description: This scheme provides agriculture loans to farmers owning a maximum of 5 acres of non-irrigated land (or 2.5 acres of irrigated land).
